title: 6 Best Open-Source AI Tools to Build Dashboards

title_ja: ダッシュボード構築に役立つ優れたオープンソース AI ツール 6 選
description: A review of six open source AI powered dashboard tools, highlighting their core features and use cases to help you create data driven dashboards with ease.
description_cn: 盘点六款开源 AI 仪表盘工具，聚焦核心功能与使用场景，轻松创建数据驱动的仪表盘。
